overlays_enabled.label: Enable overlays
overlays_enabled.tooltip: When checked, Streamlabs Chatbot will send WebSocket events to the overlays of this script

notification_on_new_version.label: Notify me on new version
notification_on_new_version.tooltip: When checked, on Streamlabs Chatbot startup the script will check for updaes and notify you if there is any

faceit_permission_message.value: $username, gotcha! You don't have permission to use $command
faceit_permission_message.label: Permission Error Message
faceit_permission_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when the user of a command does not have permission to use it

faceit_cooldown_message.value: $username, not too fast! You need to wait $cooldownTimer seconds till you can use $command again
faceit_cooldown_message.label: Cooldown message
faceit_cooldown_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when the user of a command is on cooldown

faceit_elo_command.label: Command
faceit_elo_command.tooltip: The text that should trigger the Faceit Elo Check command

faceit_elo_permission.label: User Permission
faceit_elo_permission.tooltip: The group of users that can use this command

faceit_elo_permission_specific.label: Specific User
faceit_elo_permission_specific.tooltip: This field should only be filled when User Permission is set to user_specific.

faceit_elo_user_cooldown.label: User Cooldown (in seconds)
faceit_elo_user_cooldown.tooltip: How much time an user has to wait before using this command again

faceit_elo_success_message.value: $username, the Faceit ELO for $player is $elo that makes him level $level.
faceit_elo_success_message.label: Message
faceit_elo_success_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when using the command

faceit_elo_error_message.value: Nice try, $username, but $player's ELO is under a rock, 'cause I can't find it.
faceit_elo_error_message.label: Error Message
faceit_elo_error_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chart when using the command and there's an error

faceit_start_session_command.label: Command
faceit_start_session_command.tooltip: The text that should trigger the Faceit Start Session command

faceit_start_session_permission.label: User Permission
faceit_start_session_permission.tooltip: The group of users that can use this command

faceit_start_session_permission_specific.label: Specific User
faceit_start_session_permission_specific.tooltip: This field should only be filled when User Permission is set to user_specific.

faceit_start_session_global_cooldown.label: Global Cooldown (in seconds)
faceit_start_session_global_cooldown.tooltip: How much time this command is to be on wait to use it again

faceit_start_session_success_message.value: $username, a new session started, I'll keep track of the matches played from now on.
faceit_start_session_success_message.label: Message
faceit_start_session_success_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when using the command

faceit_start_session_error_message.value: Oh, dear, $username, something went wrong trying to start a new session.
faceit_start_session_error_message.label: Error Message
faceit_start_session_error_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chart when using the command and there's an error

faceit_session_command.label: Command
faceit_session_command.tooltip: The text that should trigger the Faceit Session Check command

faceit_session_include_all_matches.label: Include hub and other custom matches
faceit_session_include_all_matches.tooltip: When checked, this command will check all matches and not only matchmaking

faceit_session_permission.label: User Permission
faceit_session_permission.tooltip: The group of users that can use this command

faceit_session_permission_specific.label: Specific User
faceit_session_permission_specific.tooltip: This field should only be filled when User Permission is set to user_specific.

faceit_session_global_cooldown.label: Global Cooldown (in seconds)
faceit_session_global_cooldown.tooltip: How much time this command is to be on wait to use it again

faceit_session_user_cooldown.label: User Cooldown (in seconds)
faceit_session_user_cooldown.tooltip: How much time an user has to wait before using this command again

faceit_session_success_message.value: $username, we've played $total_matches in total, won $won_matches, lost $lost_matches and this session elo balance is $elo_balance.
faceit_session_success_message.label: Message
faceit_session_success_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when using the command

faceit_session_error_message.value: Oh, dear, $username, something went wrong trying to get this session's data. Try it again later and if the issue persists contact the streamer.
faceit_session_error_message.label: Error Message
faceit_session_error_message.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chart when using the command and there's an error

button_donate.label: Donate
button_donate.tooltip: I do this for free, maybe consider buying me a cup of coffee?

button_set_defaults.label: Restore Default settings
button_set_defaults.tooltip:
Reset settings to default values.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface
